G'day, Bruce here. I'm here to announce *exclusively on LET* my new hosting brand - **Wombat Hosting**

To encourage people to try our services, we're doing a limited offer - **$1 for ALL plans** (First 50 to signup, July only, promo code is *DollarTrial*, pricing as below after first month)  

We're not here just for the summer. In fact most of our nodes have already been running for more than a year without downtime (security reboots excepted)

------------

* OpenVZ using Virtualizor 
* 1 x IPv4 + /112 IPv6 included
* RAID HDD
* FREE Interworx license (10 domain)
* 99.9% SLA 
* Instant Activation

Tier-1 Upstream Providers  
Datacenter: Atlanta, US  

Terms of Service
----------------

### Refunds - we only want happy customers.  

* 7 day no-quibble refund on all monthly plans  
* pro-rated refunds on quarterly/yearly plans  
* subject to acceptable use policy  

Acceptable Use
--------------

### Usual Datacenter usage rules apply

* no illegal or harmful stuff
* no Warez, Linkz, X-Share or Torrent sites
* no SPAM
* no open relay/VPM/proxy/tor


Some info about Kent Digital
----------------------------

Kent Digital Ltd. is a UK registered company  
We've been providing managed hosting for over 10 years, mostly for local clients and consulting projects.  
Wombat Hosting was setup as a new brand, focussing on unmanaged services  
Our vision is to provide quality service with a smile, friendly support even for unmanaged services
